prompt: <description>**Intermediate Part 1** **Construct a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom.** Begin by creating a new coordinate system with euler angles 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 and translation vector 0.0, 0.0, 0.0. Draw the first face of the prism as follows: - Create line 1 with start point [0.0, 0.0] and end point [0.75, 0.0]. - Create line 2 with start point [0.75, 0.0] and end point [0.75, 0.5625]. - Create line 3 with start point [0.75, 0.5625] and end point [0.0, 0.5625]. - Create line 4 with start point [0.0, 0.5625] and end point [0.0, 0.0]. The loop for this face is closed, as the first and last points are the same. **Intermediate Part 2** **Construct a 3D model of a rectangular prism with a smaller rectangular prism on top of it.** Create a new coordinate system with euler angles 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 and translation vector 0.0, 0.0, 0.1875. Draw the first face of the larger prism as follows: - Create line 1 with start point [0.0, 0.0] and end point [0.0937, 0.0]. - Create line 2 with start point [0.0937, 0.0] and end point [0.4688, 0.5625]. - Create line 3 with start point [0.4688, 0.5625] and end point [0.0, 0.5625]. - Create line 4 with start point [0.0, 0.5625] and end point [0.0, 0.0]. The loop for this face is also closed. Draw the second face as follows: - Create line 1 with start point [0.5625, 0.0] and end point [0.75, 0.0]. - Create line 2 with start point [0.75, 0.0] and end point [0.75, 0.2812]. - Create line 3 with start point [0.75, 0.2812] and end point [0.5625, 0.0]. The loop for this face is closed. Scale the 2D sketches using a scaling parameter of 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketches into 3D sketches using the euler angles and translation vector defined for each part. Extrude the 3D models to obtain the final shapes. For the first part, the extrusion depth towards the normal is 0.1875, and for the second part, the extrusion depth towards the normal is also 0.1875. The operation for the first part is creation of a new solid body, and for the second part, it is joining with the previously created body.</description>
